channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 摩根大通去年利润创历史新高，将股息提高 9.5%，达到每股 1.15 美元
item.description:
JPMorgan lifted its dividend 9.5% to $1.15 a share after reporting a record profit last year https://t.co/5a92y67dsT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 纳斯达克最大的股东迪拜交易所将出售其在交易所运营商中约三分之一的股份
item.description:
Nasdaq’s biggest shareholder, Borse Dubai, is selling roughly one third of its stake in the exchange operator https://t.co/n9I8rTXyks

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 科威特正在三个炼油厂加紧加工原油，以遵守与欧佩克+达成的自愿石油减产协议
item.description:
Kuwait is cranking up crude processing at its three refineries as the nation complies with voluntary oil production curtailments agreed with OPEC+ https://t.co/qGVbkOjHPW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美联储今天可能按兵不动，市场将重点关注最新的点阵图以及杰罗姆-鲍威尔就何时开始削减开支给出的任何指导意见
item.description:
The Fed may hold today, with markets focused on the updated dot plot and any guidance from Jerome Powell on when cuts will start https://t.co/QT3bzh9RUf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 凯雷的 Jeff Currie 说，如果美联储在未来几个月内降息，大宗商品价格将有更大的反弹空间
item.description:
Commodities prices have more room to rally if the Fed cuts interest rates in coming months, Carlyle’s Jeff Currie says https://t.co/qkuVw9MDLY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 债券交易商正在加大对国债的空头押注，以应对美联储将调低市场对今年降息预期的风险
item.description:
Bond traders are stepping up short bets against Treasuries, positioning for the risk that the Fed will dial back the market’s expectations for interest-rate cuts this year https://t.co/aR5dL93nkQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 过去的减半事件曾导致比特币大幅反弹。据 @olgakharif 称，这次可能会有所不同
item.description:
Past halving events have led to a massive rally in Bitcoin. This time could be different, according to @olgakharif https://t.co/xDqFUZiOO1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 贝莱德正准备通过与数字资产专家 Securitize 合作发行基金

BlackRock is preparing to offer a fund through a partnership with digital-asset specialist Securitize https://t.co/nHGdzx5NJc

item.title: 乌拉圭支付金融科技公司 Dlocal 的股价创下了自 2023 年 5 月以来的最差表现，此前该公司的盈利未达预期，并表示较高的支出将对今年的利润率造成压力。
item.description:
Shares of Uruguayan payments fintech Dlocal posted their worst performance since May 2023 after the company missed earnings forecasts and flagged that higher spending would weigh on margins this year. https://t.co/nqqP0NFJEv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: "卡莱尔能源途径首席战略官杰夫-库里（Jeff Currie）在接受彭博电视阿里克斯-斯蒂尔（Alix Steel）采访时说："在经济扩张的晚期做空石油和大宗商品，就像在暴风雪中做空天然气一样。
item.description:
“Being short oil and commodities in a late-cycle expansion is like being short natural gas in a blizzard,” Jeff Currie, Carlyle’s chief strategy officer of energy pathways, says during an interview with Alix Steel on Bloomberg Television https://t.co/PmOIvFWZBq pic.twitter.com/Ciy6nk3MLm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统即将颁布新的尾气排放规定，这是他气候议程中的一项标志性内容，将引发一场关于电动汽车的选举年政治斗争
item.description:
President Joe Biden is about to deliver new rules on tailpipe emissions, a signature piece of his climate agenda, that will inflame an election-year political battle over electric vehicles https://t.co/Uua6I3kScs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在输掉纽约州的民事欺诈诉讼后，特朗普欠纽约州 4.54 亿美元。如果他不还钱呢？
item.description:
Trump owes New York $454 million after losing the state’s civil fraud suit. What if he doesn't pay up? https://t.co/UZyC1VjvWP

item.title: 在美联储决定如何以及何时放慢从金融体系中抽走过多现金的步伐之际，美国融资市场出现了令人鼓舞的迹象。
item.description:
US funding markets are offering signs of encouragement to the Federal Reserve as it determines exactly how and when to slow the pace at which it drains excess cash from the financial system. https://t.co/tCegdHmX3r

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: Addi 是一家 "先买后付 "初创公司，2023 年客户数量达到 200 万，该公司筹集了 8600 万美元的债务和股权资金，以加倍拓展在哥伦比亚的业务。
item.description:
Addi, a buy now pay later startup that reached two million clients in 2023, raised $86 million of debt and equity to double down on its operations in Colombia https://t.co/mGwEOZxQwC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 贡渥集团全球研究和分析主管表示，即使欧佩克+产油国和盟国决定不延长目前的减产协议，第三季度的油价也可能在每桶85-90美元左右。
item.description:
Oil prices likely will trade at about $85-$90 a barrel in the third quarter even if OPEC+ producers and allies decide not to extend current supply cuts, said Gunvor’s global head of research and analysis. https://t.co/aJNszJwBC4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一个新的竞争对手加入了拉丁美洲领先石化公司 Braskem 多数股权的争夺战。
item.description:
A new competitor has entered the race for a majority stake in Latin America’s leading petrochemical company Braskem. https://t.co/vTxsXZwR6b

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 巴西亿万富翁、BTG 公司创始人安德烈-埃斯特维斯（Andre Esteves）认为，人工智能股票的持续上涨正在帮助发展中国家的资本市场流失资金。
item.description:
The relentless rally in artificial-intelligence stocks is helping drain money from capital markets across developing nations, according to Andre Esteves, the Brazilian billionaire founder of BTG https://t.co/QvarT4X7VJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 阿波罗计划为其第三支混合价值基金筹集至少 60 亿美元，提供介于债务和股权之间的融资
item.description:
Apollo aims to raise at least $6 billion for its third Hybrid Value Fund, providing financing that sits between debt and equity https://t.co/OWqP4GSi3G

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 华盛顿州即将进行债务再融资的大型交易将导致旧市政债券的持有者面临潜在损失，该交易正遭到投资者的反对。
item.description:
The state of Washington is getting pushback from investors on an upcoming mega deal to refinance debt that would cause holders of the old municipal bonds to face potential losses. https://t.co/9xlTvFfnDR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy）的投资者购买了比特币最大企业持有者的股票，以增加对数字资产的风险敞口。
item.description:
MicroStrategy investors who bought shares of the biggest corporate holder of Bitcoin to gain amped-up exposure to the digital asset are getting a painful reminder of its brutal volatility. https://t.co/iVbDDz1qbb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 北欧航空公司 SAS 的债务重组获得破产法庭批准，该重组由法航-荷航和私募股权公司 Castlelake 出资 12 亿美元进行。
item.description:
Scandinavian airline SAS won bankruptcy court approval on a debt restructuring funded by a $1.2 billion investment anchored by Air France-KLM and private equity firm Castlelake. https://t.co/5BN0Ot8cGV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 工党候任财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）承诺对英国经济进行根本性的 "方向修正
item.description:
Labour’s chancellor-in-waiting Rachel Reeves pledged a fundamental “course correction” for the UK’s economy https://t.co/n6c17Wa0Wd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 迈克尔-戴尔（Michael Dell）近三年来首次抛售以其名字命名的计算机公司股票，戴尔股价因看好人工智能而飙升。
item.description:
Michael Dell is unloading shares in his namesake computer company for the first time in almost three years as Dell's stock soars on artificial-intelligence optimism https://t.co/vLjiyfxGIX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 葡萄牙社会党领导人佩德罗-努诺-桑托斯（Pedro Nuno Santos）表示，该党 "实际上不可能 "同意由中右翼民主联盟组建的新政府提出的 2025 年预算案。
item.description:
Portuguese Socialist leader Pedro Nuno Santos said it’s “practically impossible” that his party would agree with a 2025 budget presented by a new government formed by the center-right AD coalition. https://t.co/ky2b5J3fas

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一项为备受关注的美国通货膨胀指标提供关键信息的调查不久将反映出绝大多数由妇女承担的家务劳动。
item.description:
A survey that provides key information for a closely watched US inflation measure will soon reflect household work that is overwhelmingly done by women. https://t.co/0UHCFDa73Z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Super Micro 将出售 200 万股股票的预期定价时间推迟到纽约股市收盘后。
item.description:
Super Micro pushed back the expected pricing of the sale of 2 million shares to after the market closes in New York, according to people familiar with the matter. https://t.co/MamkRw4bAM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 拜登政府警告各州警惕针对供水系统的网络攻击，并指出与伊朗和中国政府有关联的黑客正在对供水系统构成威胁。
item.description:
The Biden administration is warning states to be on guard for cyberattacks against water systems, citing ongoing threats from hackers linked to the governments of Iran and China. https://t.co/t0nbkJ7OjQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024
